entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as the one who whacked the Bludger at Harry when he got the Snitch. ("It was that thug, Crabbe," said Angelina angrily.)

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is mentioned as the one who identified Crabbe as the culprit behind whacking the Bludger at Harry. ("It was that thug, Crabbe," said Angelina angrily.)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned throughout the passage as having obtained the Snitch and being a Keeper.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as landing close by Harry and expressing his anger and disdain for Harry's actions. ("Saved Weasley’s neck, haven’t you?" he said to Harry.)

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as having had his neck saved by Harry.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is mentioned as hugging Harry along with Alicia.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is mentioned as hugging Harry along with Katie.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: The Bludger is mentioned as being whacked by Crabbe at Harry when he got the Snitch.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is mentioned as being obtained by Harry and causing Crabbe to whack the Bludger at him.

relationships.description: Crabbe attacked Harry with the Bludger when he got the Snitch. ("It was that thug, Crabbe," said Angelina angrily.)
Draco Malfoy expressed his disdain for Harry's actions and called him a bad Keeper. ("Saved Weasley’s neck, haven’t you?" he said to Harry.)
Katie hugged Harry along with Alicia.
Alicia hugged Harry along with Katie.
